pkgmetadata.longdescription: Environments Behaving (Almost) as Lists // List environments are environments that have list-like properties. For instance, the elements of a list environment are ordered and can be accessed and iterated over using index subsetting, e.g. 'x - listenv(a = 1, b = 2); for (i in seq_along(x)) x[[i]] - x[[i]] ^ 2; y - as.list(x)'.
